title: [W]Claimant notice period
p1: [W]It may help the tribunal if you can provide this detail. You will not be penalised for not providing it.

areClaimantNoticePeriodDetailsCorrect.label: [W]Are the claimant’s notice period details correct?

whatAreClaimantCorrectNoticeDetails.label: [W]What are the claimant’s correct notice details? (optional)
whatAreClaimantCorrectNoticeDetails.hint: [W]For example, you may wish to clarify that the claimant was dismissed without notice or paid them a sum in lieu of notice.

whatAreClaimantCorrectNoticeDetails.tooLong: [W]The claimant notice period entered must be less than 2500 characters
